title: rerun --explicit didn't check for input being in modified (not committed) state
body:
original record had `CHANGELOG.md` listed among inputs:

```shell
$> git show bc1518edd49fa5fa1930ed69e54663f5bc2a04ca
commit bc1518edd49fa5fa1930ed69e54663f5bc2a04ca
Author: Yaroslav Halchenko <debian@onerussian.com>
Date:   Thu May 23 16:16:10 2019 -0400

    [DATALAD RUNCMD] make update-changelog
    
    === Do not change lines below ===
    {
     "chain": [],
     "cmd": "make update-changelog",
     "exit": 0,
     "extra_inputs": [],
     "inputs": [
      "CHANGELOG.md"
     ],
     "outputs": [
      "docs/source/changelog.rst"
     ],
     "pwd": "."
    }
    ^^^ Do not change lines above ^^^
```

and it was modified

```shell
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad[0.11.x]git
$> git status
On branch 0.11.x
Your branch is ahead of 'origin/0.11.x' by 1 commit.
  (use "git push" to publish your local commits)

Changes not staged for commit:
  (use "git add <file>..." to update what will be committed)
  (use "git checkout -- <file>..." to discard changes in working directory)
  (commit or discard the untracked or modified content in submodules)

	modified:   .asv (modified content)
	modified:   CHANGELOG.md
	modified:   datalad/version.py
```

so I expected `rerun` to puke, but it  happily proceeded

```
(git)hopa:~datalad/datalad[0.11.x]git
$> datalad rerun --explicit bc1518edd49fa5fa1930ed69e54663f5bc2a04ca    
[INFO   ] Making sure inputs are available (this may take some time) 
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
tools/link_issues_CHANGELOG
pandoc -t rst CHANGELOG.md >> docs/source/changelog.rst
[WARNING] Duplicate link reference '[create]' at line 1201 column 1
[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
add(ok): docs/source/changelog.rst (file)
save(ok): /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  get (notneeded: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
  unlock (notneeded: 1)
datalad rerun --explicit bc1518edd49fa5fa1930ed69e54663f5bc2a04ca  9.81s user 0.59s system 98% cpu 10.550 total
changes on filesystem:                                                                                          
 .asv               | 0
 CHANGELOG.md       | 8 ++------
 datalad/version.py | 2 +-

```

```
$> git describe
0.11.5-71-g42fd87385
```
